code: import*as TodoActionTypes from"../actionTypes/todolist";var nextTodoId=4;export var addTodo=function addTodo(text){return{type:TodoActionTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:text,id:nextTodoId++};};export var removeTodo=function removeTodo(index){return{type:TodoActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:index};};export var toggleComplete=function toggleComplete(index){return{type:TodoActionTypes.TOGGLE_ITEM_COMPLETED,payload:index};};export var removeComplete=function removeComplete(){return{type:TodoActionTypes.REMOVE_COMPLETED_ITEMS};};
